description:
With Smart EggTimer you can cook eggs perfectly.
With Smart EggTimer you can cook eggs perfectly.

The cooking time is calculated depending on

- the desired consistency
- the size of the egg
- the start temperature
- the air pressure or the geographic altitude

Minimum permissions:
- Smart EggTimer only requires authorization for GPS. This is needed to get the altitude which is used for calculation.
  No data is sent over the Internet.
